title: Beginning
body:
Hello young wizard
Will you clear those coins form this area please
They're blocking up the area
[[ Yeah Sure: |Yes]] 
[[ No (formally): |No]] ]]

title: NPC2
body:
Welcome to the town 
if you collect my coins i will think of you as my friend 
If not i will despise you
[[ Yes my good sir: |Yep]] 
[[ Nopely nope: |Nope]]

title: Happy
body:
Yummy coins good job
There is more coins at the next area

title: Yep
body: You shall ever bestow my grattitude

title: Nope
body: Ok then i shall despise you
